abstract: The base URL the context uses for loading extension resources or injecting content into webpages.
overview:
## Discussion

The default value is a unique URL using the `webkit-extension` scheme. The base URL can be set to any URL, but only the scheme and host will be used. The scheme cannot be a scheme that is already supported by [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView] (e.g. http, https, etc.). Setting is only allowed when the context is not loaded.

# baseURL

**Instance Property**

The base URL the context uses for loading extension resources or injecting content into webpages.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var baseURL: URL { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is a unique URL using the `webkit-extension` scheme. The base URL can be set to any URL, but only the scheme and host will be used. The scheme cannot be a scheme that is already supported by [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView] (e.g. http, https, etc.). Setting is only allowed when the context is not loaded.
title: baseURL
